# datapower_quotaenforcementserver (Data Source)

Quota Enforcement Server (`default` domain only)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "datapower_quotaenforcementserver" "test" {
  depends_on = [datapower_quotaenforcementserver.test]
}
```
